name: songs_v2_get_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Gets detailed information about a specific song using the given song ID.

is_id.description: The value of 'songs->id' field returned from .../shazam-songs/get-details endpoint

l.description: The language code for the response (default is 'en-US').
